name: Cocoa Powder (Unsweetened)
benefits: Unsweetened cocoa powder is extremely rich in antioxidants and flavonoids that support cardiovascular health. Provides chocolate flavor without added sugar, making it ideal for healthy breakfast bowls and desserts. Anti-inflammatory properties support overall health.

quotes: Spoon the Basic BROL into a bowl. Sprinkle with the cocoa, then drizzle with Date Syrup.
